suppress.notes: We do not use: Spring Framework 5.0.5.RELEASE + Spring Security (any version), see https://pivotal.io/security/cve-2018-1258
ldap and groovy related and they are not used in production
CVE-2016-7048: only for Postgres lt 9.6 and we use 9.6 on Azure. Also only impacts the installer.
h2database is not used in production
h2database is pulled in by liquibase, it is not used in development or production
We do not use: Spring Framework 5.0.5.RELEASE + Spring Security (any version), see https://pivotal.io/security/cve-2018-1258 False positive confirmed.
